interactivity.requirements: 35 Miku Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " What Was " Seen " One. Two. Three. " from Miku Maruyama

progression.synopsis: Miku has hurt her ankle, and although she vetoes Kirin 's helpful suggestion that Sensei give her mouth-to-mouth, she does eventually accept a piggyback ride to the nurse's office. Once there, Miku declines Sensei's offer to try his "miracle cure", citing what happened when she got a massage . They talk a bit about Kirin (who Miku considers a good friend despite the rumors she hears), Makoto (who is still paying Miku to talk her up), and the various new arrivals in the class.
trivia: Different dialogue if Kirin is still virgin
Loxonin, also known as Loxoprofen outside of Japan, is an NSAID used to treat pain and inflammation.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .16p1.
